Reference

Model Estimation

Functions used to estimate models

VAR()

Estimate single-regime VAR

threshold_VAR()

Estimate multi-regime VAR

LP()

Estimate local projections

threshold_LP()

Estimate threshold local projections

Model Analysis

Functions to anlayze forecasting dynamics

var_irf()

Estimate single-regime impulse response functions

threshold_var_irf()

Estimate multi-regime impulse response functions

var_fevd()

Estimate single-regime forecast error variance decomposition

threshold_var_fevd()

Estimate multi-regime forecast error variance decomposition

lp_irf()

Estimate single-regime impulse response functions

threshold_lp_irf()

Estimate multi-regime impulse response functions

Plots

Functions to plot forecast anlysis

individual_irf_plot()

Plot an individual IRF

irf_plot()

Plot all IRFs

Regime Aassignment

Functions to classify state

learn_regimes()

Assign regimes via unsupervised machine learning methods
